long_description: The TYR Protective Goggles Case helps preserve the longevity of your swim goggles. Its stiff molded foam construction protects lenses and gaskets from damage in your gym bag, locker or car. Secure zipper closure; drainage holes for quick drying. The TYR Protective Goggles Case fits most swim goggles.
short_description: The TYR Protective Goggles Case helps preserve the longevity of your swim goggles. Its stiff molded foam construction protects lenses and gaskets from damage in your gym bag, locker or car.
